Role: Not mentioned in the provided text. However, based on the context, it seems Tom Ayrton is not a main character in this phase.

Notable behaviors: Tom Ayrton is mentioned as answering Glenarvan's question ("At all events," said he, "this thirty-seventh degree of latitude...") and nodding assent along with Wilson and Mulready.
